DOC.brief_summary: Prevention trial of nosocomial infections in neutropenic prematures with G-CSF
DOC.brief_title: Prevention Trial of Nosocomial Infections in Neutropenic Prematures With G-CSF
DOC.criteria: < 33 weeks GA neutropenic during at least 24 hours in the first 3 weeks of life and not infected at time of inclusion < 35 if birth weight < 1500 g
